p: Three patients died of nonrelapse causes (NRM 3/32, 9.4 %). One patient with CMML in non-remission (NR) experienced primary graft failure due to a low number of CD34 + cells in graft from his 60-year-old donor and finally died from CNS hemorrhage at 1.5 months after transplantation. One patient with AML experienced secondary graft failure after CMV pneumonia and soon died. Another patient died from aspergillus pneumonia at 6 months after transplantation (TableÂ 3). There was no death due to acute or chronic GvHD.
